result.markdown:
---
title: Setup Assessment Projects
---



Template projects are avilable for both the formative and summative assessments via GitHub repositories.

Within the project templates, the `nilt` dataset has already been loaded, variables coerced, and an `nilt_subset` dataframe created for you. The `nilt_subset` dataframe has the same variables that are used in the regression model in the Summative Assessment.

### Formative

Please use this link to create your RStudio Project for the formative assessment:




```{markdown}
https://github.com/UGQuants/Formative
```




### Summative

Please use this link to create your RStudio Project for the summative assessment:

```
https://github.com/UGQuants/Summative
```
